channel.title: How do i get my server online?
channel.description: Hey guys, so i recently got a source and a client. It's a 517 game, and i was just wondering how i can put this game online so that other can play with me. P.S. I have a no-ip.org thing.

item.title: How do i get my server online?
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

There are so many guides on the internet how to do this, the ones I first used and worked are on this website. Try going into the tutorial section, or search google, you’re bound to find a good tutorial.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i get my server online?
item.dc:creator: @Nikkeboy4 Nikkeboy4
item.description:
@Nikkeboy4 wrote:

First u need portforwarding goto http://forum.portforward.com2
search cmd on your computer then type ipconfig then u see ips /ipv4 is right copu and past on iexplorel or mozilla thne u need use acc and pass is like admin admin
thne goto no-ip.com and make acc thne host server,run source and play! add my msn if u need more help Nikke.9@hotmail.com

Sorry my bad english!
